name: Bassinet
description:
Bassinet is a 2D RPG dungeon crawler, you must clear floors to advance down obtaining Items and defeating bosses.

The game is in its first build at the moment but the general idea for the game is in this mini demo.

Controls:

NOTE: you need to use a mouse to click play : )

F1 = to select controller

left joystick = move

( A ) = attack

F2 = to select keyboard

W A S D = move

Space = attack
